subject: Basketball
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski, the men's basketball coach at Duke and a national leader in the sport, stayed in the background as his campus reeled amid the rape investigation involving the university's lacrosse team.
snippet: Mike Krzyzewski, the men's basketball coach at Duke and a national leader in the sport, stayed in the background as his campus reeled amid the rape investigation involving the university's lacrosse team.
